record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2596
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2596 -- (Senate - February 06, 2008)

[Page: S751]

speaking.paragraph: I understand there is a bill at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

A bill (S. 2596) to rescind funds appropriated by the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2008 for the City of Berkeley, California, and any entities located in such city, and to provide that such funds shall be transferred to the Operation and Maintenance, Marine Corps account of the Department of Defense for the purposes of recruiting.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for its second reading and, in order to place the bill on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, I object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
